name: The rise of Rollid
description:
A devlog can be found here! Enjoy!:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWnfpwx93mLw13ZxHYs_FHg

Thanks for checking out my game! This is my first attempt on a horror game!

You are in a infested place.. or are you infested?  Your goal is to get away!

You can always check my other submissions at!: https://droei.itch.io/
